Html:
Hi,

I am having formatting problem when i save the file as pdf format.    
the solution i produced is that i send an excel file to the pdf printer.
when i select only one sheet , it is formatted automatically as a pdf document and there is no problem is here..
But, when i working with the documents with having more than one sheet; i have to select the all sheets and send to pdf printer.
How can i select multiple sheet and save it as an excel file?

thanks
best regards
